title: Deep elf soldier
data:
{{obsolete}} {{monster |name=deep elf soldier |glyph={{Red|e}} |tile=[[File:Deep elf soldier.png]] |flags={{Actual spells flag}}
{{Fighter flag}}
{{Speaks flag}}
{{Spellcaster flag}}
{{Warm blood flag}} |resistances=None |vulnerabilities=None |max_chunks=3 |meat={{Contaminated corpse}} |xp=33 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=24 |hp_range=9-18 |avg_hp=13 |armour_class=0 |evasion=12 |habitat=Land |speed= 10 |size={{Medium}} |item_use={{Weapons armour}}
{{Starting equipment}}
{{Open doors}} |attack1=6 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=3 |base_hp=3 |extra_hp=3 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{High intelligence}} |genus=elf |species=elf }} {{list of | deep elves}} {{Flavour|A common soldier of the deep elves, who knows spells useful in combat.}} ==Useful Info== '''Deep elf soldiers''' are weak and common [[list of deep elves|deep elves]], occasionally armed with elven gear and capable of the same magic as [[orc wizard]]s. They are rarely much of a threat, but can come in large numbers, usually along with more dangerous deep elves. They can be found in the [[Elven Halls]] and some [[bailey]]s. ===Variant Deep Elf Soldier=== You may encounter a '''deep elf watchman''' guarding one particular entrance to [[the Lair]]. Apart from his unique name, he has no special traits. {{flavour|A battle-scarred deep elf soldier. It eyes you warily, as though determined to keep you from gaining entry to the place it guards, and it looks well prepared to do so with strong weapons and magic.}} ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number=I |slot1=[[Magic Dart]] (3d4) |slot2=[[Slow]] |slot3=[[Haste]] |slot4=[[Magic Dart]] (3d4) |slot5=[[Blink]] |slot6=[[Blink]] }} {{Spellcaster |number=II |slot1=[[Throw Flame]] (3d5) |slot2=[[Confuse]] |slot3=[[Invisibility]] |slot4=[[Magic Dart]] (3d4) |slot5=''none'' |slot6=[[Confuse]] }} {{clear}} {{Spellcaster |number=III |slot1=[[Throw Frost]] (3d5) |slot2=[[Cantrip]] |slot3=[[Haste]] |slot4=[[Throw Flame]] (3d5) |slot5=[[Magic Dart]] (3d4) |slot6=[[Invisibility]] }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== *They're primarily only a threat to your [[scroll]]s and [[potion]]s. With [[conservation]], you can ignore them and take on more serious threats. ==History== Deep elf soldiers were removed in [[0.13]]. [[category:Elf]] [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
